name: Tesla
description: American EV and energy company known for the Powerwall home battery system.

name: Sonnen
description: German energy storage pioneer offering smart all-in-one battery systems; owned by Shell since 2019.

name: Enphase Energy
description: American microinverter and energy storage company offering modular AC-coupled batteries.

name: LG Energy Solution
description: South Korean battery manufacturer and subsidiary of LG Chem; one of the world's largest battery producers.

name: BYD
description: Chinese multinational best known for EVs and energy storage; world's largest EV and battery manufacturer.
